title: Ubuntu
lessonContent: Overview One of the most popular Linux distributions for personal machines is Ubuntu. Ubuntu also releases its own desktop environment manager Unity by default. Package Management Ubuntu is a Debian-based operating system developed by Canonical. So it uses a core Debian package management system. Configurability Ubuntu is a great choice for a beginner who wants to get into Linux. Ubuntu offers ease of use and a great user interface experience that has led to its wide adoption. Itâ€™s widely used and supported and is most like other operating systems like OSX and Windows in terms of usability. Uses Great for any platform, desktop, laptop and server.
